text:
WILLIAM O'DWYER. MAYOR
SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL. DIRECTOR
WNYC
WNYC-FM
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N. Y.
WORTH 2-5600
Hay 18, 1950
Mr. Richard B. Hull
Radio Â« TV Director
Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Dick!
I appreciate your note of May 11th. I have
just given a story concerning the Network to "RADIO DAILY"
and maybe if they do a good job on it, I will be able to
forward it to Burton for use in the N1WSLETTI2R.
The first ten stations carrying the Cooper Union
Series have been forwarded to Johnson Fairchild, and I
have indicated the desirability of an increased grant for
next year. The "Network" idea seems to have caught on,
and I am getting requests from all over for membership.
I hope I see you soon.
With best wishes, I am
v
ever.
SNSs cb
